name: DelaySay
0:
”Alexa, open Delay Say”
”Alexa, start Delay Say”
”Alexa, launch Delay Say”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: delay say
des: Have Alexa repeat your phrase after a delay of your choosing by saying: "Alexa, tell/ask Delay Say to say [your phrase] in/after [any delay in minutes or seconds less than 11 minutes]" . For example: "Alexa, tell Delay Say to say 'Don't forget to turn off the rice' in 10 minutes." Or, another example: "Alexa, ask Delay Say to say 'welcome home mom' after 55 seconds".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
